title: Repo sync

details: Refactored GitHub Actions metadata documentation: created reusable content and updated references.
Renamed metadata syntax file and updated its content for clarity.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Refactored GitHub Actions metadata documentation: created reusable content and updated references.
- Renamed metadata syntax file and updated its content for clarity.

- Expanded list of attachable file types for issues/PRs, including OpenDocument formats and development files.
